head.title: 20th Anniversary For Mary Ann Liebert, Inc.

hedline.hl1: 20th Anniversary For Mary Ann Liebert, Inc.

abstract.p: Mary Ann Liebert Inc of Larchmont, NY, which publishes more than 80 scientific and medical journals, marks its 20th anniversary (S)

block.p: Mary Ann Liebert Incorporated, a Larchmont-based company that publishes more than 80 scientific and medical journals, is celebrating its 20th anniversary. Besides weighty journals like ''Genetic Engineering News,'' Ms. Liebert produces the Westchester Wag, a free glossy monthly that covers the social life of the county's movers and shakers.
Although she said she has great fun with the two-year-old Wag, her first love remains medicine and science.

Mary Ann Liebert Incorporated, a Larchmont-based company that publishes more than 80 scientific and medical journals, is celebrating its 20th anniversary. Besides weighty journals like ''Genetic Engineering News,'' Ms. Liebert produces the Westchester Wag, a free glossy monthly that covers the social life of the county's movers and shakers.
Although she said she has great fun with the two-year-old Wag, her first love remains medicine and science.

In the last 20 years, she said, the focus in genetic engineering has been on advances in research. For the next 20 years, said Ms. Liebert, who lives in Harrison: ''My personal goal is to make sure any health care plans will cover these new diagnostics and therapeutics that biotechnology has made possible. They should be available to everyone. And I'll be there leading the troops.''
